file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: >-
    The Taxonomy REST API provides access to the UniProt taxonomy database. The services can be queried with taxonomy
    identifier(s) to retrieve hierarchical information (children, parent, sibling taxa), taxonomic lineage,
    relationships between two taxa, and common ancestors of an organism. The services can also be queried with a
    taxonomy name to find all related information to that node or hierarchical information about its children, parent
    and sibling nodes.
  version: '1.0'
  title: Taxonomy Service
  termsOfService: https://www.ebi.ac.uk/proteins/api/doc/
  contact:
    name: UniProt (EBI)
    url: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/ebi-proteins-api
tags:
  - name: taxonomy
## deprecate this registry entry?
#   - name: translator
paths:
  '/ancestor/{ids}':
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: >-
        This service returns the lowest common ancestor (LCA) of two taxonomy
        nodes.
      description: ''
      operationId: getTaxonomyAncestor
      parameters:
        - name: ids
          in: path
          description: ' A comma separated list of Taxonomy element unique identification'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
        '400':
          description: 'Request parameter {parameterName} contains unsupported value.'
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '404':
          description: No ancestors found for the taxonomy IDs
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
  '/id/{id}':
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: ' This service returns details about a taxonomy node, and also links to its parent, sibling and children nodes.'
      description: with taxonomy identification as parameter
      operationId: getTaxonomyDetailsById
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: ' Taxonomy element unique identification'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
        '400':
          description: 'Request parameter {parameterName} contains unsupported value.'
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '404':
          description: No results found for the taxonomy ID
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
  '/id/{id}/children':
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: >-
        This service returns a list of children nodes that belongs to a taxonomy
        node with links to its parent, sibling and children nodes.
      description: with taxonomy identification as parameter
      operationId: getTaxonomyNodesChildrenByIdWithDetail
      parameters:
        - name: pageNumber
          in: query
          description: pageNumber is the current page number
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: '1'
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          description: >-
            pageSize is the number of records returned in the request, max value
            is 200
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: '100'
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: ' Taxonomy element unique identification'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
        '400':
          description: 'Request parameter {parameterName} contains unsupported value.'
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '404':
          description: No results found for the taxonomy ID
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
  '/id/{id}/children/node':
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: >-
        This service returns a list of children nodes that belongs to a taxonomy
        node.
      description: with taxonomy identification as parameter
      operationId: getTaxonomyNodesChildrenById
      parameters:
        - name: pageNumber
          in: query
          description: pageNumber is the current page number
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: '1'
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          description: >-
            pageSize is the number of records returned in the request, max value
            is 200
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: '100'
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: ' Taxonomy element unique identification'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
        '400':
          description: 'Request parameter {parameterName} contains unsupported value.'
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '404':
          description: No results found for the taxonomy ID
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
  '/id/{id}/node':
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: >-
        This service returns details about a taxonomy node such as the rank,
        mnemonic, scientific name and common name.
      description: with taxonomy identification as parameter
      operationId: getTaxonomyBaseNodeById
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: ' Taxonomy element unique identification'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
        '400':
          description: 'Request parameter {parameterName} contains unsupported value.'
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '404':
          description: No results found for the taxonomy ID
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
  '/id/{id}/parent':
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: >-
        This service returns details about the parent node for a given taxonomy
        node with links to its parent, sibling and children nodes.
      description: with taxonomy identification as parameter
      operationId: getTaxonomyNodeParentByIdWithDetail
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: ' Taxonomy element unique identification'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
        '400':
          description: The id parameter cannot be null
  '/id/{id}/parent/node':
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: >-
        This service returns details about the parent node for a given taxonomy
        node.
      description: with taxonomy identification as parameter
      operationId: getTaxonomyNodeParentById
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: ' Taxonomy element unique identification'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
        '400':
          description: The id parameter cannot be null
  '/id/{id}/siblings':
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: >-
        This service returns a list of sibling nodes that belongs for a given
        taxonomy node with links to its parent, sibling and children nodes.
      description: with taxonomy identification as parameter
      operationId: getTaxonomyNodesSiblingsByIdWithDetail
      parameters:
        - name: pageNumber
          in: query
          description: pageNumber is the current page number
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: '1'
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          description: >-
            pageSize is the number of records returned in the request, max value
            is 200
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: '100'
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: ' Taxonomy element unique identification'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
        '400':
          description: 'Request parameter {parameterName} contains unsupported value.'
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '404':
          description: No results found for the taxonomy ID
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
  '/id/{id}/siblings/node':
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: >-
        This service returns a list of sibling nodes that belongs for a given
        taxonomy node.
      description: with taxonomy identification as parameter
      operationId: getTaxonomyNodesSiblingsById
      parameters:
        - name: pageNumber
          in: query
          description: pageNumber is the current page number
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: '1'
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          description: >-
            pageSize is the number of records returned in the request, max value
            is 200
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: '100'
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: ' Taxonomy element unique identification'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
        '400':
          description: 'Request parameter {parameterName} contains unsupported value.'
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '404':
          description: No results found for the taxonomy ID
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
  '/ids/{ids}':
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: ' This service returns a list of taxonomy node details with links to its parent, sibling and children nodes.'
      description: with taxonomy identification as parameter
      operationId: getTaxonomyDetailsByIdList
      parameters:
        - name: ids
          in: path
          description: ' A comma separated list of Taxonomy element unique identification'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
        '400':
          description: 'Request parameter {parameterName} contains unsupported value.'
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '404':
          description: No results found for the taxonomy ID
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
  '/ids/{ids}/node':
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: >-
        This service returns a list of taxonomy node details such as the rank,
        mnemonic, scientific name and common name.
      description: with taxonomy identification as parameter
      operationId: getTaxonomyBaseNodeByIds
      parameters:
        - name: ids
          in: path
          description: ' A comma separated list of Taxonomy element unique identification'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
        '400':
          description: 'Request parameter {parameterName} contains unsupported value.'
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '404':
          description: No results found for the taxonomy ID
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
  '/lineage/{id}':
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: >-
        This service returns the taxonomic lineage for a given taxonomy node. It
        lists the nodes as they appear in the taxonomic tree, with the more
        specific listed first.
      description: with taxonomy identification as parameter
      operationId: getTaxonomyLineageById
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: ' Taxonomy element unique identification'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
        '400':
          description: 'Request parameter {parameterName} contains unsupported value.'
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '404':
          description: No lineage found for the taxonomy ID
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
  '/name/{name}':
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: >-
        This service returns a list of taxonomic nodes with the specific queried
        name. For each node, the service provides it’s taxonomic details and
        also links to its parent, siblings and children nodes.
      description: with taxonomy name as parameter
      operationId: getTaxonomiesDetailsByName
      parameters:
        - name: pageNumber
          in: query
          description: pageNumber is the current page number
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: '1'
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          description: >-
            pageSize is the number of records returned in the request, max value
            is 200
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: '100'
        - name: name
          in: path
          description: >-
            Taxonomy name that will be searched in scientificName, commonName
            and mnemonic
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: searchType
          in: query
          description: >-
            Type of the search, valid values are EQUALSTO,STARTSWITH,ENDSWITH or
            CONTAINS
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: EQUALSTO
        - name: fieldName
          in: query
          description: 'fieldName, valid values are SCIENTIFICNAME, COMMONNAME or MNEMONIC'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: SCIENTIFICNAME
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
        '400':
          description: 'Request parameter {parameterName} contains unsupported value.'
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '404':
          description: No results found for the taxonomy name
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
  '/name/{name}/node':
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: >-
        This service returns a list of taxonomic nodes with a specific name. For
        each node, the service provides it’s taxonomic details such as the rank,
        mnemonic, scientific name and common name.
      description: with taxonomy name as parameter
      operationId: getTaxonomiesNodeBaseByName
      parameters:
        - name: pageNumber
          in: query
          description: pageNumber is the current page number
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: '1'
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          description: >-
            pageSize is the number of records returned in the request, max value
            is 200
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: '100'
        - name: name
          in: path
          description: >-
            Taxonomy name that will be searched in scientificName, commonName
            and mnemonic
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: searchType
          in: query
          description: >-
            Type of the search, valid values are EQUALSTO,STARTSWITH,ENDSWITH or
            CONTAINS
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: EQUALSTO
        - name: fieldName
          in: query
          description: 'fieldName, valid values are SCIENTIFICNAME, COMMONNAME or MNEMONIC'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: SCIENTIFICNAME
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Taxonomies'
        '400':
          description: 'Request parameter {parameterName} contains unsupported value.'
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '404':
          description: No results found for the taxonomy name
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
  /path:
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: >-
        This service returns all taxonomic nodes that have a relationship with
        the queried taxonomy ID in a specific direction (TOP or BOTTOM) and
        depth level.
      description: ''
      operationId: getTaxonomyPath
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: query
          description: ' Taxonomy element unique identification'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: depth
          in: query
          description: >-
            Number of depth levels for taxonomy path, valid values between 1 and
            5
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            minimum: 1
        - name: direction
          in: query
          description: 'Direction for taxonomy path, valid values are TOP and BOTTOM'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
        '400':
          description: 'Request parameter {parameterName} contains unsupported value.'
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '404':
          description: No taxonomy results found for the searched path
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
  /path/nodes:
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: >-
        This service returns paginated taxonomy node list that have a
        relationship with the queried taxonomy ID in a specific direction (TOP
        or BOTTOM) and depth level.
      description: ''
      operationId: getTaxonomyPathNodes
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: query
          description: ' Taxonomy element unique identification'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: depth
          in: query
          description: >-
            Number of depth levels for taxonomy path, valid values between 1 and
            5
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            minimum: 1
        - name: direction
          in: query
          description: 'Direction for taxonomy path, valid values are TOP and BOTTOM'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: pageNumber
          in: query
          description: pageNumber is the current page number
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: '1'
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          description: >-
            pageSize is the number of records returned in the request, max value
            is 200
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: '100'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
        '400':
          description: 'Request parameter {parameterName} contains unsupported value.'
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '404':
          description: No taxonomy results found for the searched path
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
  /relationship:
    get:
      tags:
        - taxonomy
      summary: >-
        This service returns the shortest path between two taxonomy nodes
        showing their relationship.
      description: ''
      operationId: checkRelationshipBetweenTaxonomies
      parameters:
        - name: from
          in: query
          description: Initial taxonomy element unique identification for relationship
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: to
          in: query
          description: Final taxonomy element unique identification for relationship
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
        '400':
          description: 'Request parameter {parameterName} contains unsupported value.'
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '404':
          description: No taxonomy results found for the searched relationship
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorMessage'
servers:
  - url: 'https://www.ebi.ac.uk/proteins/api/taxonomy'
components:
  schemas:
    TaxonomiesRedirect:
      type: object
      required:
        - redirectLocation
        - requestedId
      properties:
        requestedId:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        redirectLocation:
          type: string
    Taxonomies:
      type: object
      properties:
        pageInfo:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/PageInformation'
        taxonomies:
          type: array
          xml:
            name: taxonomy
            wrapped: true
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
        errors:
          type: array
          xml:
            name: error
            wrapped: true
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomiesError'
        redirects:
          type: array
          xml:
            name: redirect
            wrapped: true
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomiesRedirect'
    TaxonomiesError:
      type: object
      required:
        - errorMessage
        - requestedId
      properties:
        requestedId:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        errorMessage:
          type: string
    PageInformation:
      type: object
      required:
        - currentPage
        - resultsPerPage
        - totalRecords
      properties:
        resultsPerPage:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        currentPage:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        totalRecords:
          type: integer
          format: int32
    ErrorMessage:
      type: object
      properties:
        requestedURL:
          type: string
        errorMessage:
          type: array
          xml:
            name: errorMessages
            wrapped: true
          items:
            type: string
    TaxonomyNode:
      type: object
      required:
        - mnemonic
        - taxonomyId
      properties:
        taxonomyId:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        mnemonic:
          type: string
        scientificName:
          type: string
        commonName:
          type: string
        synonym:
          type: string
        rank:
          type: string
        superregnum:
          type: string
        parent:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
        parentLink:
          type: string
        children:
          type: array
          xml:
            name: child
            wrapped: true
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
        childrenLinks:
          type: array
          xml:
            name: childLink
            wrapped: true
          items:
            type: string
        siblings:
          type: array
          xml:
            name: sibling
            wrapped: true
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxonomyNode'
        siblingsLinks:
          type: array
          xml:
            name: siblingLinks
            wrapped: true
          items:
            type: string
